data.comment: The big names in today's match at Morumbí have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Sao Paulo.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 6, Luciano Da Rocha for Sao Paulo drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Recife PE.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo drive forward through Igor Gomes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Luan Polli, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 10, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Recife PE throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 14, Luciano Da Rocha scores to make it 1-0 at Morumbí.
Dani Alves instrumental with a fine assist.
Marcao Silva of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 15, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Recife PE are coming forward and Patric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 22, Lucas Mugni for Recife PE is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Morumbí.
In the minute 25, Luan Polli for Recife PE is back on the field again.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara of Sao Paulo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 31, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Free kick Recife PE.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardinho (Recife PE) has received a first yellow card.
Recife PE will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sao Paulo.
Sander for Recife PE has been booked by Felipe Fernandes de Lima and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 43, Sao Paulo are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Morumbí, Iago Maidana has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Sao Paulo's Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Recife PE throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Recife PE.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Morumbí.
In the minute 46, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Jair Ventura is making the team's first substitution at Morumbí with Thiago Neves replacing Iago Maidana.
Jonathan Gomez is replacing Ricardinho for the away team.
In the minute 48, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Recife PE.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juanfran (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 55, Can Recife PE capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
Sao Paulo drive upfield and Dani Alves gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 58, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Recife PE throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Lucas Mugni for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 61, Jair Ventura (Recife PE) is making a third substitution, with Betinho replacing Ronaldo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 62, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 64, Sao Paulo's Luan has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima blows against Recife PE's Dalberto for offside.
Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Luciano Da Rocha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 74, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Vitor Bueno is replacing Igor Gomes for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 75, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Igor Vinicius is on a sub for Juanfran for Sao Paulo.
Recife PE's Rafael Thyere has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Dani Alves misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 76, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Dalberto (Recife PE) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 78, Important block from the Recife PE defence as Igor Vinicius fires in a strike for Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
The home team have replaced Luciano Da Rocha with Pablo Felipe. This is the third substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Brenner with Tche Tche.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Recife PE's area.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 82, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 84, Recife PE make their fourth substitution with Mikael replacing Marcao Silva.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Sao Paulo's Reinaldo gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Recife PE.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Recife PE attack but Patric's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara (Sao Paulo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Luan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Dani Alves (Sao Paulo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Robert Arboleda (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
